name: Paloma
description: A simple tequila cocktail made with grapefruit soda.

ingredients.ingredient: tequila (I prefer a silver or blanco, but use what you like)
Grapefruite soda (like Fresca, Squirt, or Jarritos)
(optional) Tajin - a seasoning mix of lime, chilies, and salt

directions: Rim your glass with a wedge of lime and the Tajin (if using) or salt.
Squeeze the other lime into the glass.
Add a pinch of salt to the glass.
Fill with the grapefruit soda and stir.
Garnish with a wedge of lime and enjoy!.
